entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:59 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -33.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 2:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -33.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -52
Dewpoint: -37.5°C
Wind: S 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023
